duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensuring compliance with current guidelines of relevant medical associations and specialty boards for the residency program.
Coordinating day-to-day operations of the department’s residency and/or fellowship program.
Maintaining rotation schedules, grand round appointments, and accurate records of current and past residents.
Coordinating all aspects of the resident/fellow interview process and ensuring applicant credentials are in compliance with current guidelines.
Implementing and managing the New Innovations residency management software.
Coordinating Orientation Day for new house staff and maintaining demographic information in relevant tracking systems.
Serving as a resource for all house staff personnel and assisting in resolving problems and concerns.
Assisting International applicants with VISA requirements and submitting required documents.
Monitoring licensing requirements and following up with applicants regarding missing credentials.
Acting as the primary resource management representative of the organization and engaging with relevant thought leaders and policy-makers.

education_certification.credential: Certified as TAGME (Training Administrators of Graduate Medical Education) preferred
